name: PDF to Word Conversion
feature: Convert PDFs to editable Word documents.
benefit: Allows users to easily edit and customize PDF content in Word, making it ideal for students, professionals, and businesses who need to work with PDF content in a more flexible format.

name: Word to PDF Conversion
feature: Convert Word documents to PDF format.
benefit: Simplifies document sharing and ensures compatibility across devices and platforms, making it essential for creating professional documents and reports.

name: Merge PDFs
feature: Combine multiple PDFs into a single document.
benefit: Streamlines document organization and presentation, useful for anyone dealing with large PDF files, such as researchers, teachers, and office administrators.

name: PDF to PowerPoint Conversion
feature: Convert PDF presentations to editable PowerPoint slides.
benefit: Facilitates easy customization and modification of presentation content, a valuable tool for educators, presenters, and students.

name: PDF to Excel Conversion
feature: Convert PDF tables into Excel spreadsheets.
benefit: Speeds up data extraction and analysis, crucial for financial professionals, researchers, and data analysts.

name: PDF to JPG Conversion
feature: Convert PDF pages to image files (JPEG).
benefit: Allows for image extraction from PDFs, beneficial for designers, graphic artists, and those working with visual content.

name: JPG to PDF Conversion
feature: Convert image files (JPEG) to PDF documents.
benefit: Enables users to compile multiple images into a single PDF file, handy for photographers, students, and anyone needing to create PDF albums.

name: Excel to PDF Conversion
feature: Convert Excel spreadsheets to PDF format.
benefit: Ensures easy sharing and preservation of Excel data while maintaining formatting, a time-saver for businesses and financial analysts.

name: Page Numbering
feature: Add page numbers to PDF documents.
benefit: Enhances document organization and professionalism, particularly useful for publishers, authors, and legal professionals.

name: Sign to PDF
benefit: Provides a secure and legally accepted way to sign and certify PDFs, crucial for contracts, agreements, and legal documents.
